name: Snipe The Elite
description:
This game was created by HRZN Games for the 2022 Gamedev.tv Game Jam!

Video Trailer

OBJECTIVE

Your primary objective is to shoot and eliminate all of the "elite" soldiers.

There are also 10 green bottles to collect (shoot) and we seem to have misplaced 5 gold bars, so if you could find those too that would be great!

SCORE

Score is calculated as follows:

  • 10 points per gold bar found
  • 5 points per bottle shot
  • 10 points per enemy killed
  • 50 points per moving enemy killed

If you have bullet drop enabled, each successful shot will return double points, i.e a moving enemy will award you 100 points, a stationary enemy will award you 20 points, and a bottle will award you 10 points.

At the end of the game, you will receive an accuracy bonus too, this will be the percentage multiplied by 10. For example, if you finish with 50% accuracy, you will receive 500 bonus points.

The maximum score attainable is 2910 for the following:

  • 17 moving targets with bullet drop: 1700
  • 3 stationary targets with bullet drop: 60
  • 10 bottles with bullet drop: 100
  • 5 gold bars: 50
  • 100% accuracy bonus: 1000

If you manage to reach over 2500 points you are a legendary sniper!

HINTS / TIPS

Unless you have a supercomputer, I'd suggest setting the graphics to low or medium, as I haven't done any kind of optimisations! High runs fine for me with a 2070 GPU, but your mileage may vary!

You can enable or disable bullet drop in the settings menu, and you can also set the percentage chance of the bullet cam to 0% to disable it, if you find it's getting repetitive!
